title.value: Ресурсосбережение на основе модернизации технологических процессов производства говядины
Resources savings on the basis of modernization of beef manufacture technological processes
Resources savings on the basis of modernization of beef manufacture technological processes

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Skakun, A.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented the substantiation of methods to improve technological processes that reduce energy consumption in the production of beef in an industrial complex for breeding and fattening of young cattle. Technical re-equipment of technological processes of a complex on large horned livestock cultivation has allowed to increase monetary proceeds from realization of a livestock by meat in 7,2 times, to increase profitability of beef manufacture up to 26,7%. Modernization of technical processes on a complex on large horned livestock cultivation has provided reduction in the forages charge on 58% (5,2 forage unit), the electric power in 2,6 times, combustive-lubricating materials in 7 times, thermal energy - in 4,6 times, work - in 2 times and increase of a daily average gain of alive weight up to 1033 grams. Transition to coordinate system of fodder mixes distribution allows to save 1,5 million kwh of the electric power. Introduction of the modernized system of manure removal helps to lower consumption of water on 46,2% in comparison with those to reconstruction, an expense of the electric power on 44,1%, combustive-lubricating materials - on 47,4%.
